name: Ninja Adventure GameFrame
description:
Open source rpg game https://github.com/Taikatou/GameFrame

Assets thanks to Prime 31's Nez.

https://github.com/prime31/Nez

TileMap rendering thanks to Craftwork game's Monogame extended

https://github.com/craftworkgames/MonoGame.Extende...

Story scripting thanks to Ink

https://github.com/inkle/ink

Instructions

Run Ninja Adventure.exe

Controls: Keyboard and mouse

w, a, s, d and arrow-keys = Movement

Shift = Run

e = Interact (Fish/Talk/etc.)

Click anywhere and you will walk there.

Scroll to zoom in and out.

Controls : GamePad

A = Interact

B = Run

Left control stick = Walk

Dpad/Right control stick = Dialog choices.

Mobile controls

Touch screen to move to tile.

Touch person to talk to them.

Touch dialog box to progress

Touch text box to choose it. :)
